Detailed Description

Abstract class to manipulate a Field

virtual int atmi::Field::add ( Buffer *  b) [protected, pure virtual]

add the fiels into the buffer

When successfull the value of focc is set

virtual int atmi::Field::get ( Buffer *  b,
FLDOCC32  occ 
) [protected, pure virtual]

Retrieves the value of the field's occurence found into the buffer

Upon success the value of focc is set to the retrieved occurence.

Parameters:
bbuffer from which to retrieve the field's value
occoccurence to retreive

Implemented in atmi::TField< T >, atmi::TField< string >, and atmi::TField< char * >.

const char* atmi::Field::tname ( )

the name of the fml field type
int atmi::Field::type ( )

Possible values are: FLD_SHORT 0 short int FLD_LONG 1 long int FLD_CHAR 2 character FLD_FLOAT 3 single-precision float FLD_DOUBLE 4 double-precision float FLD_STRING 5 string - null terminated FLD_CARRAY 6 character array FLD_PTR 9 pointer to a buffer FLD_FML32 10 embedded FML32 buffer FLD_VIEW32 11 embedded VIEW32 buffer FLD_MBSTRING 12 multibyte character array

Returns:
the field's type

Returns:
a string describing the field
